title: All Clove Commute Messenger Medium
description: Complement your work day look with a classic modern workwear, the Urban Classic Briefcase Bag and make sure you walk into work, in ample style. The modern silhouette, durable choice of exterior as well as spacious interior with extra-functional compartments assure its effortless compatibility with your modern lifestyle. Handcrafted with premium leatherite, scratch- resistant felt and soft-touch poly suede, the bag offers dependable safety to all your tech accessories.

details.heading: COMMUTE MESSENGER
details.content: Handcrafted with pure cotton canvas in dual as well as solid colour combinations, Commute is your go-to office bag that comes with robust storage solutions and lets you carry all your work essentials seamlessly.

details.heading: CARRY EVERYTHING
details.content: Designed for effortless access to all your work accessories. Commute features dedicated and secure storage for your laptop, two internal slip pockets to organise your adapter, cables and an unclassified main compartment for everything else.

title: All Beige Pedal Daypack
description: Minimally designed in a distinct half-capsule shape, Pedal Daypack is an exemplary choice for outdoors. Crafted in pure cotton canvas, its super-lightweight and comes with a wide opening to store large items while offering a comfortable and ergonomic fit.

details.heading: PEDAL DAYPACK
details.content: A small, lightweight backpack to store and carry your day’s supplies. Ideal for travel, city or campus use, Pedal is crafted from highly durable cotton-canvas and comes in a sharp half-capsule shape.

details.heading: BIG ENOUGH FOR SMALL EXTRAS
details.content: Pedal can carry your books, stationery, snacks, clothes, laptop, water bottle and some extras. It comes with an distinctly long zipper that lets you store relatively bigger items unlike other backpacks.

title: Mesa Monitor Stand - (Red)
description: Elevate your monitor as well as your workstation experience with Mesa Monitor Stand! Your ultimate ally for productive working, it is a perfect coalition of design and function. It’s thoughtful design frees up valuable space on your desk and elevated height supports improved working posture, making it ergonomically friendly. Durable, matte-finish aluminium gives the stand design a clean modern expression to complement contemporary device designs. Natural oakwood tray softens the look and adds a warm feel while the colours bring the fun element.

details.heading: MESA MONITOR STAND
details.content: Elevate your monitor as well as your workstation experience with Mesa Monitor Stand. Raise your monitor screen for comfortable viewing and find additional storage for your stationery and keyboard beneath, give your workdesk an organised look.

details.heading: FLEXIBLE STORAGE FOR ESSENTIALS
details.content: Along with providing a stable space to place your monitor, Mesa comes with a pull-out wooden tray inside to organise the rest of your desk essentials systematically.
